entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
